item.title: the ego
item.description: I sit here trying to come up with the title of this blog post. First, I type “a sneaky, pesky ego”. Hmm, too weird. Scrap that. “the trap of living in an external world”, Now we are getting a bit preachy. Scrap that too. What about “the ego”. Ack, seems too succint and profound. Then the thought came… I’m looking to write about the ego of man, and it’s the exact things preventing me from writing this blog post.
